defineservice.name: metratech.com/BulkDiscountPT
defineservice.description: Parameter table for configuring BulkDiscount Decision attributes

ptype.description: Tier start for the range of units covered by the bulk discount decision.
Tier end for the range of units covered by the bulk discount decision.
Percentage by which the units will be discounted if the number of units for the charge falls within the StartOfUnitRange and EndOfUnitRange. Value must be between 0 and 100.
